alert.note: Alert for McLean; Sheridan (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 9:25PM CDT until August 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sheridan County in south central North Dakota... Eastern McLean County in south central North Dakota... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Butte, or 23 miles west of Harvey, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Sheridan and eastern McLean Counties, including the following locations... Sheyenne Lake, Krueger Lake and Kief. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
